item.title: [PI] Easter ring help
item.dc:creator: @totalystylin1 totalystylin1
item.description:
@totalystylin1 wrote:

[code=] if(c.wearId == 7927) { c.resetWalkingQueue(); for (int i = 0; i < 14; i++) { c.setSidebarInterface(i, 6014); } c.sendMessage("As you put on the ring you turn into an egg!"); c.npcId2 = 3689 + Misc.random(5); c.isNpc = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Want to be able to move around as an egg? use this 1

item.title: [PI] Easter ring help
item.dc:creator: @Nathan6 Nathan_
item.description:
@Nathan6 wrote:

I added this command into WearItem.java:

if(c.wearId == 7927) {
                c.setSidebarInterface(1, 6014);
                c.setSidebarInterface(2, 6014);
                c.setSidebarInterface(3, 6014);
                c.setSidebarInterface(4, 6014);
                c.setSidebarInterface(5, 6014);
                c.setSidebarInterface(6, 6014);
                c.setSidebarInterface(7, 6014);
                c.setSidebarInterface(8, 6014);
                c.setSidebarInterface(9, 6014); 
                c.setSidebarInterface(10, 6014);
                c.setSidebarInterface(11, 6014);
                c.setSidebarInterface(12, 6014);
                c.setSidebarInterface(13, 6014);
                c.setSidebarInterface(0, 6014);
c.sendMessage("As you put on the ring you turn into an egg!");
c.npcId2 = 3689 + Misc.random(5);
c.isNpc = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

Here’s the error I got when I tried to compile:


src\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:45: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable Misc
location: class server.model.players.packets.WearItem
c.npcId2 = 3689 + Misc.random(5);
                  ^
src\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:45: operator + cannot be applied
to int,Misc.random
c.npcId2 = 3689 + Misc.random(5);
           ^
src\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:45: incompatible types
found   : <nulltype>
required: int
c.npcId2 = 3689 + Misc.random(5);
                ^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Help please.

Read full topic
